ac:layout-cell.p: This is the Index page for the Architecture Confluence Space with the English version of the ARC42 Template.

ac:rich-text-body.p: The easiest way for browsing this space is to turn on the sidebar of confluence. You will find the button for it on the righthand side the top row of your browser, portrayed as two adjacent rectangles, between "login" and the search field ("search confluence"). Simply toggle it - and the sidebar will show up.
The sidebar works like any browser tree structure. It shows all the 12 chapters of the ARC42 Template. Click on the "+" to see the subchapters or hide them again by clicking "-".
